page.title: 14Pets' Corner Roadshow.
page.content: As well as having displays of domesticated animals at Letham Glen and Silverburn Estate, Kirkcaldy Distric Council also offers to schools the opportunity to be visited by the "Pets Corner Roadshow." The Pets Corner Roadshow is usually set up within the school playground. The participating children are given ample opportunity to handle the animals (with supervision)and to experience an old fashioned form of transport-they are given a short ride round the playground in a cart pulled by a pony.Feedstuffs and grooming materials are also demonstrated. Usually 3 classes (approximately 30 children per class) are covered per visit.If a class is doing a particular project help may be given.
